item.title: 日本央行保持利率稳定，官员关注全球风险上升
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫考虑了 1 月份加息的影响，并对全球经济风险保持警惕，因此维持关键政策利率不变。【原文：The Bank of Japan kept its key policy rate unchanged, as Governor Kazuo Ueda mulled the impact from January’s hike and remained wary of risks in the global economy.】

item.title: 贝恩资本旗下桥梁数据公司获得创纪录的 28 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，贝恩资本（Bain Capital）旗下的数据中心运营商 Bridge Data Centres 为其在马来西亚的业务获得了 28 亿美元的贷款，这是该公司有史以来最大的一笔银行融资交易。【原文：Bain Capital-owned data center operator Bridge Data Centres has obtained a $2.8 billion loan for its operations in Malaysia, according to people familiar with the matter, marking the its largest bank financing deal ever.】

item.title: 印尼公司债券利差在动荡中触及六个月高位
item.description: 随着信贷交易商消化股市暴跌带来的影响，印尼公司的美元债券利差已达到六个月来最宽的水平。【原文：Indonesian companies’ dollar bond spreads have hit their widest level in six months as credit traders digest the ramifications of a brutal stock market selloff.】

item.title: 中国玉米进口放缓，前景堪忧
item.description: 中国的玉米进口速度是七个季度以来最慢的，这表明即使缩减年度采购量的预测也可能难以实现。【原文：Chinese corn imports are running at their slowest pace in seven seasons, suggesting that even scaled back forecasts for annual purchases may prove hard to reach.】

item.title: 普京在会谈中拒绝乌克兰停火，但特朗普称这是一场胜利
item.description: 弗拉基米尔-普京总统拒绝了唐纳德-特朗普和他的团队提出的在乌克兰实现 30 天停火的要求，而这正是结束长达三年冲突的必经之路。但这对美国总统来说已经足够了。【原文：President Vladimir Putin refused to give Donald Trump the 30-day ceasefire in Ukraine he and his team had demanded on the path toward ending the three-year conflict. It was still good enough for the US president.】

item.title: 交易员权衡美联储动向和风险厌恶情绪，黄金维持在历史纪录附近
item.description: 在美联储做出利率决定之前，黄金保持在创纪录水平附近，华尔街大跌后的风险厌恶情绪为贵金属提供了支撑。【原文：Gold held near a record ahead of an interest-rate decision from the Federal Reserve, with the precious metal supported by risk-off sentiment following a selloff on Wall Street.】

item.title: 铁矿石运输车坠毁后矿产资源公司股价暴跌 13
item.description: 澳大利亚矿业公司矿产资源有限公司（Mineral Resources Ltd.）暂停从其昂斯洛铁矿项目沿通往港口的主干道运输铁矿石后，股价暴跌达 13%。【原文：Shares in Australian miner Mineral Resources Ltd. slumped by as much as 13% after the company suspended haulage of iron ore from its Onslow Iron project along the main road to port.】

item.title: 爱尔兰中央银行因贸易风险下调经济预测
item.description: 爱尔兰中央银行下调了经济展望，理由是地缘政治不确定性空前上升，可能会对爱尔兰产生巨大影响。【原文：The Irish Central Bank has revised down its outlook for the economy, citing an unprecedented rise in geopolitical uncertainty that could have an outsized impact on Ireland.】

item.title: 英国 "拉平 "计划岌岌可危，不平等将进一步扩大
item.description: 一项新的分析显示，未来三年内，英国大部分地区将进一步落后于伦敦，这凸显了工党政府在提高全国生活水平方面所面临的挑战。【原文：Most UK regions are set to fall further behind London over the next three years, according to a new analysis, highlighting the Labour government’s challenge to improve living standards across the country.】

item.title: 腾讯人工智能计划被视为中国科技股进一步上涨的关键
item.description: 随着阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司因中国在人工智能领域的成功而成为投资者关注的焦点，腾讯控股有限公司仍在等待轮到自己大放异彩。【原文：With Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. grabbing the spotlight of investor attention over China’s success in artificial intelligence, Tencent Holdings Ltd. is still waiting for its turn to shine.】

item.title: 日本出口在特朗普加征关税前加速增长
item.description: 日本出口增速加快，原因是企业在美国提高关税前增加了订单。【原文：Japan’s exports rose at a faster pace as businesses increased orders ahead of the rollout of higher tariffs in the US.】

item.title: 慧科公司的怀特未向董事会充分披露与董事会的关系
item.description: WiseTech Global Ltd.创始人理查德-怀特（Richard White）未能向董事会完全披露与一名员工和一家供应商的两段关系，但外部调查人员排除了他更严重的歧视和不当行为指控。【原文：WiseTech Global Ltd. founder Richard White failed to fully disclose two relationships with an employee and a supplier to the board, but external investigators cleared him of more serious allegations of discrimination and inappropriate conduct.】

item.title: 美国石油库存攀升，地缘政治成为焦点，石油保持跌势
item.description: 由于一份行业报告指出美国原油库存增加，同时地缘政治担忧继续发酵，石油保持跌势。【原文：Oil held a decline as an industry report pointed to a build in US crude stockpiles, while geopolitical concerns continued to fester.】

item.title: 中国私募股权和风险投资基金寻求更多时间部署资本
item.description: 在几年前的科技热潮中募集资金投资中国的风险投资和其他私募股权基金正日益面临窘境。一些基金已经没有时间让投资者的现金发挥作用了，而投资机会也变得渺茫。【原文：Venture capital and other private equity funds that raised money to invest in China during a tech boom a few years ago are increasingly facing a quandary. Some are running out of time to put investors’ cash to work, and the pickings have become slim.】

item.title: 美联储将维持利率不变，鲍威尔的讲话备受关注
item.description: 美联储官员周三开会时可能会维持利率稳定，以争取时间评估唐纳德-特朗普总统的政策如何影响面临持续通胀压力和日益增长的增长担忧的经济。【原文：Federal Reserve officials will likely hold interest rates steady when they meet Wednesday, buying time to assess how President Donald Trump’s policies impact an economy facing both lingering inflationary pressures and mounting growth concerns.】

item.title: 甲骨文为何可能成为 TikTok 交易的关键
item.description: TikTok 母公司字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd.）再次向出售其热门视频应用的最后期限发起冲击，否则将面临美国的禁令。几家感兴趣的买家已经公开露面，其中讨论最多的交易方案涉及该视频平台的长期合作伙伴扮演的关键角色：甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp.【原文：TikTok parent company ByteDance Ltd. is once again racing toward a deadline to sell off its popular video app or face a ban in the US. Several interested buyers have publicly emerged, and the most discussed deal scenarios involve a key role for a longtime partner of the video platform: Oracle Corp.】

item.title: 美联储会议前亚洲股市将追随华尔街走低市场综述
item.description: 亚洲股市将追随华尔街的跌势，此前最大的科技公司再次出现大量抛售，这表明投资者正在减少对美国风险资产的投资。黄金攀升至历史新高。【原文：Stocks in Asia are set to follow declines on Wall Street, after heavy selling resumed in the largest technology companies in a sign investors are paring exposure in US risk assets. Gold climbed to a fresh record.】

item.title: 道明如何成为美国洗钱者最方便的银行
item.description:
快速扩张使道明银行成为家喻户晓的银行，但也使其容易受到骗子和 31 亿美元罚款的侵害。【原文：

Rapid expansion made TD Bank a household name but left it vulnerable to crooks—and $3.1 billion in fines.

】

item.title: 印尼股市狂飙引发新的可投资性担忧
item.description: 事情不该是这样发展的。就在一年多以前，投资者还对印尼持乐观态度，期待普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）能延续前总统佐科-维多多（Joko Widodo）的亲商政策。【原文：It wasn’t supposed to unfold this way. Just over a year ago, optimism about Indonesia was running high, with investors expecting Prabowo Subianto to extend former President Joko Widodo’s pro-business policies.】

item.title: 白莲花促进旅游业发展，曼谷航空公司寻求 30 架新喷气机
item.description: 曼谷航空公司（Bangkok Airways Pcl）正在加紧订购多达 30 架新飞机，以更新其老化的机队，并计划在电视剧《白莲花》热播的推动下促进旅游业的发展。【原文：Bangkok Airways Pcl is gearing up to order as many as 30 new aircraft as it renews its aging fleet and plans for a tourism boost driven by the popularity of television series the White Lotus.】

item.title: 印尼可能维持利率不变，因为股市和贸易动荡威胁印尼盾
item.description: 在印尼资深财政部长被迫否认导致股市暴跌的辞职传言后，印尼央行可能会维持关键利率不变，以支持印尼盾，选择保持稳定。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank may hold its key interest rate unchanged to support the rupiah, opting for stability after the nation’s veteran finance minister was forced to deny resignation rumors that sent stocks tumbling.】

item.title: JX Metals 将在日本自软银以来最大规模的首次公开募股后首次亮相
item.description: JX Advanced Metals Corp. 首次公开募股募集到 4390 亿日元（约合 29 亿美元）资金，将于周三在东京证券交易所上市，这是自六年多前软银公司（SoftBank Corp.【原文：JX Advanced Metals Corp. is set to debut on the Tokyo Stock Exchange on Wednesday after its initial public offering raised ¥439 billion ($2.9 billion), the nation’s biggest float since SoftBank Corp.’s mega deal more than six years ago.】

item.title: 中国银行将消费贷款利率降至历史最低点以刺激需求
item.description: 随着政策制定者加大刺激力度以稳定增长并对抗美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税，中国的银行正在将消费贷款利率降至历史最低水平。【原文：Chinese banks are slashing rates on consumer loans to record lows as policymakers ramp up stimulus to stabilize growth and counter US President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 美国希望向欧洲盟国保证在乌克兰协议中的作用
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，美国官员已告诉欧洲同行，鉴于俄罗斯希望作为协议的一部分而免受欧盟的制裁，欧盟必须参与任何乌克兰和平协议。【原文：US officials have told their European counterparts that the European Union will have to be involved in any Ukraine peace agreement given that Russia wants relief from sanctions imposed by the bloc as part of a deal, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 摩根大通仅从 Javice 的用户数据中获得 10 位新客户
item.description: 摩根大通银行曾梦想以 1.75 亿美元收购查理-贾维斯的学生金融创业公司 Frank，从而增加数百万新的年轻客户。但最终，该银行只获得了 10 个支票账户。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. once dreamed of adding millions of new, young customers by acquiring Charlie Javice’s student-finance startup, Frank, for $175 million. Ultimately, however, the bank netted only 10 checking accounts.】

item.title: 参议院小组搁置提高哥伦比亚工人福利的法案
item.description: 哥伦比亚参议院的一个委员会否决了总统古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）的劳动改革法案，该法案本可提高工人福利，但却给雇主带来了额外成本。【原文：A Colombian senate committee blocked President Gustavo Petro’s labor reform bill, which would have bolstered workers’ benefits but imposed extra costs on employers.】

item.title: 交易员因寻求美联储澄清而撤回降息押注
item.description: 在经济和政治交织的大环境下，交易商们在寻求美联储的明确态度，同时也在缩减对美国降息的押注。【原文：Traders are ratcheting back wagers on US interest-rate cuts as they seek clarity from the Federal Reserve amid a thicket of economic and political crosscurrents.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官因兜售失败而失去股票王者地位
item.description: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）正在股票市场上失去他的灵光一现。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang is losing his midas touch in the stock market.】

item.title: 投资者抢滩中国，可转换债券跃居美国同行之首
item.description: 让中国股市今年一飞冲天的 "动物精神 "正蔓延到中国公司发行的可转换债券中，这些公司的债券在全球约 4000 亿美元的市场中回报率和交易量都遥遥领先。【原文：The animal spirits that sent Chinese stocks flying this year are spilling into convertible bonds issued from companies based in the country, with their notes leading the roughly $400 billion global market in both returns and trading volume.】

item.title: 特朗普将与阿联酋高官举行芯片和投资会谈
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普预计将于周二在白宫宴请阿联酋的一位高级官员，因为这个海湾国家正努力通过在该国投资来放宽对美国技术的准入。【原文：US President Donald Trump is expected to host a senior UAE official for dinner Tuesday at the White House, as the Gulf nation pushes to ease access to US technology by investing in the country.】
